title: React
subtitle: The library for web and native user interfaces
description: React is the library for web and native user interfaces. Build user interfaces out of individual pieces called components written in JavaScript.
content: React is the library for web and native user interfaces. Build user interfaces out of individual pieces called components written in JavaScript. React is designed to let you seamlessly combine components written by independent people, teams, and organizations.

title: Next.js
subtitle: The React Framework for the Web
description: Next.js by Vercel is the full-stack React framework for the web.
content: Used by some of the world's largest companies, Next.js enables you to create full-stack Web applications by extending the latest React features, and integrating powerful Rust-based JavaScript tooling for the fastest builds.

title: Astro
subtitle: The web framework for content-driven websites
description: Astro builds fast content sites, powerful web applications, dynamic server APIs, and everything in-between.
content: The web framework for content-driven websites. Astro powers the world's fastest websites, client-side web apps, dynamic API endpoints, and everything in-between.

title: Vue
subtitle: The Progressive JavaScript Framework
description: An approachable, performant and versatile framework for building web user interfaces.
content: The Progressive JavaScript Framework Â· Approachable. Builds on top of standard HTML, CSS and JavaScript with intuitive API and world-class documentation.

title: Nuxt
subtitle: The Intuitive Vue Framework
description: Nuxt is an open source framework that makes web development intuitive and powerful. Create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.
content: The Intuitive Vue Framework. Nuxt is an open source framework that makes web development intuitive and powerful. Create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.

title: Angular
subtitle: Deliver web apps with confidence
description: The web development framework for building the future.
content: Angular lets you start small and supports you as your team and apps grow.

title: Svelte
subtitle: Cybernetically enhanced web apps
content: Svelte. Cybernetically enhanced web apps. Compiled. Compact. Complete.

title: Solid
subtitle: Simple and performant reactivity for building user interfaces
description: A declarative, efficient and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
content: Simple and performant reactivity for building user interfaces. A declarative, efficient and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

title: Qwik
subtitle: Deliver instant apps at scale
description: Build instantly-interactive web apps without effort.
